page.title: 06POINTON-STORES & CLUBS
page.content: {POINTON STORES The shop, 24 High Street, occupies the ground floor of a late 19th century house. It the only grocery shop in the village and is open 6 days a week from 8.30am to 5.30pm with an hour off for lunch.Thursday is early closing day. Besides dry goods and tinned foods it sells fresh meat and dairy produce. {CLUBS { The Village Hall}provides a centre for the village. Weekly bingo sessions are popular,as is the weekly Old Time Dancing school. Pre-school children attend a weekly Playgroup giving vent to creative, artistic and social instincts.Senior Citizens,known as the Good Companions, meet once a fortnight.Until recently Discotheques were held once a month on Saturday nights for the teenagers.
